title: Reporting on Science (Part 2)
description: In the conclusion of Neil’s interview with veteran science journalist Miles O’Brien, the two discuss the inherent conflict between the goals of true journalism and corporate America.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
